message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for only $75. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece worth $80 at such a great value.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. How about $70? I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.

I understand your position, Bob. Let me make you an even better deal. How about $72 for our premium product? It's still a great saving compared to its value, and I believe this price will be more agreeable for both of us.
